author: duartej
body:
#### PR description:

The 3D pixel technology has started to be included in the simulation. 
This includes:
 * A new digitizer for the sensor response of 3D pixels (just in 
 the Barrel, needs a specialization for the Forward region);
 * Add the Geometry scenario (T19, D60) with the 3D sensors description 
 in the Phase 2 Tracker detector XMLs. T19 has 3D sensors (25x100) in
 TBPX L1 + TBPX L2 + TFPX R1
 * Add needed mechanisms to integrate the 3D description and new geometry
 (workflows, new module type, ..)
 * Not activating the template CPE reconstruction for 3D pixels
 * Inclusion of a new validator allowing to compare simulated digis with 
 test beam data (not fully operational)

The work has not finished yet, still missing functionalities: 
 * Specialize algorithm to the forward region
 * Study on the upstream reconstruction algorithms 
 * Finish validation code  

######  No expected changes in the ouput (3D pixels digis has the relaular PSimHits format)
###### No externals nor PRs depends 
###### New 3D digitizer description: https://indico.cern.ch/event/848296/contributions/3580105/attachments/1917341/3170469/Pixels3D_inclusion_CMSSWW.pdf
###### Tracker Layout with 3D sensors: https://indico.cern.ch/event/838963/contributions/3679017/attachments/1964989/3267164/ghugo.pdf

#### PR validation:
* Checked all dependencies, clean build, and all unit tests succeed, i.e over `CMSSW_11_1_X_2020-02-13-2300`, `scram b distclean; git cms-checkdeps -a -A; scram b` commands worked. 
* Some tests failed because problems with dataset not present  `scram b runtests` worked.  Looks like some sites has access problems. 
* All tests passed: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`
title: Inclusion of Pixel 3D technology in the innermost layers of Phase 2 Inner Tracker
